directions: Combine apple cider, orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, and cloves in a large pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for 20 minutes. Strain cinnamon sticks and cloves from punch before serving.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
title: Warm Apple Citrus Punch
